text: @piersmorgan @BorisJohnson It's exactly the same where I live..ppl ignoring lockdown and ignoring social distancing..Where dealing with two pandemics here..One for Coronavirus and the second for STUPIDITY..Government need to get hold of this especially in light of 20,000 deaths in hospital..
